entries.description: Creating SAM Applications into a different folder than the current VS Code workspaces will now open an application file after app creation (#678)
Improved the description of the selection item when picking a location for a new SAM Application (#673, #675)
Added JSON validation for ECS task definition intellisense
Bumped maximum (exclusive) supported SAM CLI version from 0.23.0 to 0.30.0.
